name: Great.
description:
Great is a short game about nothing created in pursuit of learning how to make video games. It's a whisper of a hint of a Metroidvania. I made everything except for the music and half the sound effects. You are an angel for playing it.

Great has both gamepad and mouse/keyboard controls, though only the gamepad controls show up in-game. Here are the mouse and keyboard controls!

A/D Move
S Crouch
W Interact
SHIFT Sprint
LEFT MOUSE Punch
SPACE Jump
ARROW KEYS Look Ahead
ESC Pause

Made mostly with Unity, Visual Studio Code, Aseprite, and BFXR.

Release Notes

Great v1.1

  • Added ending dialogue.
  • Increased boss invulnerability time.
  • Fixed walljump stickiness.
  • Fixed going too fast and falling through floor bug.
  • Fixed missing button prompts.
